snippet: As SiriusXM satellite radio approaches 24 million subscribers, this once-minor factor in promoting songs has become a proving ground for new bands, a steppingstone between the Internet and FM radio.
abstract: SiriusXM satellite radio, which is approaching 24 million subscribers, has evolved from once-minor player in promoting songs to proving ground for new bands, steppingstone between Internet and FM radio.
lead_paragraph: As SiriusXM satellite radio approaches 24 million subscribers, this once-minor factor in promoting songs has become a proving ground for new bands, a steppingstone between the Internet and FM radio.

headline.seo: SiriusXM’s Alt Nation Becomes a Proving Ground for New Bands
